round_length.description: The length of a round in seconds.

setup_timeout.description: The amount of time (in seconds) players get to set their board up.

invite_timeout.description: How long after an invite is sent that it will timeout.

auth_setup.description: Roles that are authorized to set up Battleship.

broadcast.description: Whether or not to broadcast important events in Battleship games.

enforce_max_zone_dist.description: Whether or not to forfeit games automatically when players move too far away from their play space.

max_zone_dist.description: The maximum distance (in studs) a player who is in a game can be from their zone space before the game is forfeited.
